Google Search is the most popular search engine in the world, and it's no surprise that many users prefer to use it as their default search engine on their Windows 10 computer. In this article, we'll walk you through how to download and use Google Search on your Windows 10 computer.

## Step 1: Download Google Chrome

In order to use Google Search on your Windows 10 computer, you'll first need to download Google Chrome, which is Google's web browser. To download Google Chrome, simply visit the [Google Chrome website](https://www.google.com/chrome/) and click "Download Chrome". Follow the on-screen instructions to install the web browser on your computer.

## Step 2: Set Google Search as your default search engine

Once you have Google Chrome installed, you can set Google Search as your default search engine. To do this, follow these steps:

1. Open Google Chrome and click on the three dots in the top right corner.
2. Select "Settings" from the dropdown menu.
3. Scroll down to the "Search engine" section and click on "Manage search engines".
4. Under "Other search engines", click "Add".
5. In the "Search engine" box, enter "Google Search".
6. In the "Keyword" box, enter "Google" (or any other keyword you want to use).
7. In the "URL" box, enter "https://www.google.com/search?q=%s".
8. Click "Save".

You have now set Google Search as your default search engine in Google Chrome.

## Step 3: Use Google Search

To use Google Search, simply open a new tab in Google Chrome and type in your search query in the search bar. You can also type your search query directly into the omnibox (the address bar).

Google Search will now return the most relevant search results based on your search query. You can click on any of the search results to visit the website, or you can refine your search query by using the search tools on the left-hand side of the search results page.

## Conclusion

Google Search is an essential tool for anyone who wants to quickly and easily find information on the internet. By following the steps outlined in this article, you can easily download and use Google Search on your Windows 10 computer. So why wait? Start using Google Search today and discover the power of the world's most popular search engine.
